description: Consultancy and Engineering Services Currently working at Alten as a Product Owner with Scrum Framework. Analyze and understand the business requirements for further refinement with the business analyst and development team. Roadmapping and high level estimation to build linked with the prioritized milestones.        Prioritization to Epic and Features level, and Items contained in the Team Product backlog.        Process modeling in the analysis stage to get the target process (MODELIO). Backlog Items breackdown in close collaboration with the Business Analyst. Product and Technical Backlog refinement to understand the intention and priority of the US. Promoting and attending Scrum ceremonies.

Banking Company: At Citi, I worked as a Product Owner, the Product team under the SAFe (Scaled Agile Framework) guidelines for stream value organization, and Scrum for team orientation. Transversal tasks previous scrum teams assignation:  Analyze and understand the requirements received to involve all Impacted tracks required in the scope. Coordinate the walkthrough to get the L0 estimations and Plan. Closely work with the Regional PMs and Business stakeholders to plan every ART (Agile Release Train).  Jira and Confluence Dashboard building. Scrum teams working: Creation of User Stories in close collaboration with the Product Manager. Backlog refinement to understand the intention and priority of the US. Attending SAFe and Scrum ceremonies.
